snippet: Guests at the Disney California Adventure Park in California had a little too much adventure when a malfunctioning Ferris wheel stranded them for nearly two hours....

headline.print_headline: Stalled Disney Ride Strands Passengers for 2 Hours
headline.main: Stalled Disney Ride Strands Passengers for 2 Hours

lead_paragraph: Guests at the Disney California Adventure Park in California had a little too much adventure when a malfunctioning Ferris wheel stranded them for nearly two hours.
